477 CONNECT 79 TWEET 34 LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Want to see the best vacation rentals in the USA? HomeAway has picked one amazing rental from each state, and the photo gallery above will take you on a tour of these luxurious digs.
Want to see even more over-the-top vacation rentals? Here are 10 bucket-list rentals around the world:
This three-bedroom in Cape Town, South Africa, sleeps six and rents from $1,300 per night. Thanks to a partnership with Dubai's Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing, HomeAway now features hundreds of Dubai properties on its new Arabic and English website, homeaway.ae. Here's a look at eight vacation rentals available on the site.1. This three-bedroom in Dubai Marina starts at $2,163 per week. HomeAway.com Fullscreen For more information: https://en.homeaway.ae/rentals/80 HomeAway.com Fullscreen 2. Stay in the tallest building in the world, the Burj Khalifa.
